Major_Arcs.title: King Guz and Alley's Initial Encounter
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces King Guz and Alley Oop and establishes their initial relationship through a dramatic rescue and a subsequent conflict over an unpaid debt. It sets the stage for Alley's character as both a rescuer and someone who is opportunistic.

sub_scenes.title: King Guz's Dramatic Rescue
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on the immediate danger King Guz faces and Alley's heroic intervention, showcasing Alley's capability and confidence in a rescue situation.

sub_scenes.title: The Debt Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene immediately follows the rescue and reveals Alley's opportunistic nature by shifting the focus from heroism to a personal gain, creating a contrast and complexity in his character.

Major_Arcs.title: Dinny's Age and Potential Replacement
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc centers around Dinny the dinosaur's age-related clumsiness and the subsequent consideration of replacing him. It explores themes of aging, utility, and attachment through Dinny and Alley's interactions and discussions with other characters.

sub_scenes.title: Dinny's Clumsiness Revealed
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Dinny's problem of bumping into trees, highlighting his age and wear as the cause of his clumsiness.

sub_scenes.title: Considering Dinny's Replacement
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene directly addresses the consequence of Dinny's age, with suggestions to replace him, leading to the decision to explore dinosaur dealerships.

sub_scenes.title: Shopping for New Dinosaurs
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Alley and Man 3 at Honest Zog's dealership, actively looking for a replacement for Dinny, showcasing different models and test drives.

narrative_arcs.title: Shopping at Honest Zog's Dinosaur Dealership

sub_scenes.title: Dinny's Comparison and the Zippy Model's Bite
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene contrasts Dinny with a newer, faster model, leading to Dinny being bitten, emphasizing the downsides of the new model and Dinny's vulnerability.

narrative_arcs.title: The Zippy Dinosaur's Speed and Dinny's Bite

sub_scenes.title: Complaint and Dinny's Injury
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene deals with the immediate aftermath of the bite, focusing on the complaint at the dealership and the visible damage to Dinny's tail, highlighting the consequences of the test drive.

narrative_arcs.title: Complaints at Honest Zog's and the Damaged Tail

sub_scenes.title: Dinny's Farewell and Sale
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on the emotional farewell to Dinny, a flashback to his training, and his eventual placement for sale at the dealership, marking the end of Dinny's active service.

narrative_arcs.title: Farewell to Dinny and Decision to Trade
Dinny Offered for Sale at Honest New & Used Dinosaurs

sub_scenes.title: Dinny's Sales Pitch and Test Ride Mishap
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the sales process for Dinny, including the salesman's pitch, price negotiation, and a test ride that ends in a tree collision, further emphasizing Dinny's clumsiness and reduced value.

narrative_arcs.title: Continuing the Sales Pitch and Price Negotiation
Dinny's Test Ride and Tree Collision
Fall from Dinny, Scolding, and Dinny's Voice

sub_scenes.title: Dinny's Mistreatment and Rescue
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shifts to Dinny's mistreatment by a new owner and a heroic intervention, showing Dinny's vulnerability and the emergence of a new protector.

Major_Arcs.title: Romantic Rejection and Misogynistic Outbursts
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc explores themes of romantic rejection and societal attitudes towards women through different scenarios. It contrasts Coola's assertive rejection of Alley with a fisherman's misogynistic complaints and cavemen's romantic rivalries.

sub_scenes.title: Coola's Rejection and Alley's Comeuppance
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Coola's firm rejection of Alley's fishing invitation and Alley's surprising, possibly karmic, misfortune.

narrative_arcs.title: Rejected Fishing Trip and Unexpected Consequence

sub_scenes.title: Misogynistic Fisherman's Complaint
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene showcases a fisherman's misogynistic views, highlighting stereotypical complaints about women in the context of fishing, and culminating in his own reprimand for being disruptive.

narrative_arcs.title: Misogynistic Fishermen and Their Noisy Outbursts

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Rivalry and Investigation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces a caveman's suspicion of romantic competition and his decision to investigate, leading to a shift in romantic interest.

sub_scenes.title: Jealousy, Violence, and Misunderstanding
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts a violent outburst fueled by jealousy and a subsequent misunderstanding about affection, highlighting the chaotic nature of romantic conflicts.

sub_scenes.title: Romance Lessons and Cultural Differences
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene explores the concept of romance, contrasting different cultural approaches and leading to a humorous, skeptical attempt to learn romantic techniques.

sub_scenes.title: Escalating Romantic Competition
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene showcases escalating romantic gestures between cavemen, moving from flowers to more elaborate gifts, and introducing unexpected dangers and comical outcomes.

narrative_arcs.title: Log as a Bridge and Crocodile Encounter
Reprimand for Vulgarity and Squashed Crocodile

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Misunderstandings and Violence
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts romantic misunderstandings leading to jealousy, aggression, and comical resolutions based on misinterpretations of romantic gestures.

narrative_arcs.title: Clarification and Comical Resolution - Kissing Hand

sub_scenes.title: Infidelity Accusations and Domestic Disputes
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene explores themes of infidelity, accusations, and domestic conflict, ranging from public confrontations to physical violence and attempts at romantic reformation.

Major_Arcs.title: The Twitch Dance Craze and its Consequences
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on the humorous and chaotic effects of a new dance craze called 'the twitch'. It shows injuries, relationship ultimatums, disastrous dance lessons, and the dance's unexpectedly terrifying effect on observers.

sub_scenes.title: Twitch Dance Injuries and Initial Skepticism
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the 'twitch' dance and its immediate consequence: injuries, particularly among older participants, setting a humorous tone.

sub_scenes.title: Oola's Dance Ultimatum
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene presents Oola's ultimatum to Alley, forcing him to learn the 'twitch' dance to save their relationship, escalating the personal stakes related to the dance craze.

sub_scenes.title: Alley's Disastrous Dance Lesson
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details Alley's first attempt to learn 'the twitch', resulting in a comically painful and unsuccessful lesson.

sub_scenes.title: The Terrifying Twitch Demonstration and its Aftermath
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene reveals the unexpectedly frightening effect of 'the twitch' on observers, leading to chaos and a humorous explanation for hospitalizations.

Major_Arcs.title: Time Travel for Historical Research
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces a time travel plotline, starting with researchers facing a historical information gap and deciding to use a time machine to send Alley Oop to 16th Century Spain for firsthand research, leading to unexpected romantic interruptions and unintended consequences.

sub_scenes.title: The 16th Century Spain Research Dilemma
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene sets up the problem: researchers struggling with a lack of historical records for 16th Century Spain, leading them to consider unconventional methods.

narrative_arcs.title: The Dilemma of 16th Century Spanish History

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Interlude Interrupted by Time Travel
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows the researchers using the time machine and unexpectedly interrupting a romantic moment between Alley Oop and Oola, leading to their unintended transportation to the future.

narrative_arcs.title: The Kiss Interrupted by Time Travel

sub_scenes.title: The Spain Assignment and Return Trip
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene clarifies the purpose of the time travel as a research assignment in Spain and shows Alley Oop and Oola being sent back to the past to fulfill this mission.

narrative_arcs.title: The Spain Assignment and Return to the Past

sub_scenes.title: Arrival in Spain and Hostile Reception
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Alley Oop and Oola's arrival in medieval Spain and their immediate unwelcome encounter, setting the stage for conflict in the new historical setting.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival in Medieval Spain and Hostile Welcome

sub_scenes.title: Serenade, Rejection, and Alley Oop's Intervention
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces a parallel storyline with a disruptive serenade, leading to Alley Oop intervening and escalating the situation.

narrative_arcs.title: The Serenade and the Dame's Ire
Alley Oop's Intervention and Demand for Manners

sub_scenes.title: Lute Attack and Romantic Misunderstanding
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Alley Oop's violent intervention, leading to a misunderstanding when Oola reveals the serenader is her 'boyfriend', creating romantic conflict.

narrative_arcs.title: The Lute Attack and Dame's Annoyance
The Famous Matador and the Manager's Threat

sub_scenes.title: Bool-Fight and Unexpected Toreador Role
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shifts focus to the consequence of injuring the matador, leading to Alley Oop unexpectedly becoming a 'toreador' in a 'bool-fight' as a replacement.

narrative_arcs.title: Aftermath and Pressure for a Toreador

sub_scenes.title: Alley Oop's Bool-Fight Victory and Return
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Alley Oop's surprising victory in the 'bool-fight' and his subsequent return to the present, fulfilling the research assignment.

narrative_arcs.title: Alley Oop's Return and Promised Kiss

sub_scenes.title: Jealousy and Unfulfilled Kiss in the Present
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene contrasts Alley Oop's successful mission with a parallel scenario in the present, depicting a jealous argument and a man being denied a kiss, creating a humorous counterpoint to Alley Oop's romantic success.

Major_Arcs.title: The King for a Day Experiment
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc explores the theme of leadership and power through the concept of 'King for a Day'. It examines the perceived ease of kingship versus its harsh reality, culminating in a humorous abdication and a cyclical return to power.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction to the 'King for a Day' Concept
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the 'King for a Day' tradition and initial impressions of the role, with contrasting views on its ease.

narrative_arcs.title: King for a Day - Initial Impression

sub_scenes.title: The Harsh Reality of Kingship
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene contrasts the expected respect with the actual abusive treatment of the 'King' by the cavemen, revealing the true nature of power in their society.

narrative_arcs.title: Royal Proclamation and Former King's Instruction
Reality of Kingship - Mockery and Abuse

Major_Arcs.title: King Guz's Domestic Life and Escapism
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on King Guz's domestic life, characterized by leisure interrupted by the Queen's anger and demands. It explores themes of marital discord, escapism, and the contrast between perceived royal ease and domestic strife.

sub_scenes.title: King Guz's Leisure Interrupted
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts King Guz enjoying a life of leisure, which is abruptly disrupted by the Queen's angry confrontation.

narrative_arcs.title: King Guz's Leisure and Queen's Disgust
Broom Attack and the Demand to Wash Feet

Major_Arcs.title: King's Authority and Food Dispute
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc explores themes of authority, justice, and social dynamics through a series of disputes resolved (or unresolved) by a king figure. It moves from initial petty conflicts to the king's self-serving 'resolution' and its ironic consequences.

sub_scenes.title: Initial Petty Disputes
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces two separate minor conflicts: a cheating accusation and a money fight, setting a scene of general social discord.

narrative_arcs.title: Initial Disputes: Cheating and Money Fight

sub_scenes.title: King's Self-Serving Clam Resolution
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows the king's intervention in a clam dispute, resolving it in a way that benefits himself, highlighting his self-interest and questionable justice.

narrative_arcs.title: King's Clam Resolution and its Aftermath

sub_scenes.title: Disturbance, Violence, and King's Wisdom
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts external violence juxtaposed with the king's self-proclaimed wisdom and financial acumen, creating an ironic contrast.

sub_scenes.title: King's Meal, Food Theft, and Retribution
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene moves from the king's anticipation and enjoyment of a lavish meal to its abrupt disruption by food theft and the king's subsequent petty retribution.

Major_Arcs.title: The Barberous Act and Prophecy
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces a prophecy and its unexpected fulfillment in a humorous 'barberous act'. It plays with expectations and wordplay, revealing a barber shop scenario that is both violent and comical.

sub_scenes.title: The Prophecy of the Bearded Stranger
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene establishes a prophecy about a bearded stranger, setting up anticipation and mystery around this figure.

Major_Arcs.title: Time Machine Malfunction and Roman Soldier
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc concludes the narrative with a return to the time machine theme, depicting a scientist's experiment going awry due to a malfunction, resulting in the unexpected appearance of a Roman soldier and a humorous resolution of needing to fix the machine.

sub_scenes.title: Setting Up the Time Machine Experiment
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene initiates the time travel experiment, establishing the scientist's intention and the technology involved.
